MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA15 area of Greenock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:17pm. Our engineers are currently onsite at the Kilmun Road substation investigating the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:11pm on Saturday, 06 February 2021
